Title: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to the provision of gas service to new customers
Summary: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to providing that in the case of any application for gas service to a building which is not supplied with gas, a utility corporation or municipality shall be obligated to provide gas service to such building.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.8417 & A.8888)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the public service law relating to the provision of gas service to new customers, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 8417 and A. 8888, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
